  • Method Details

    • draw

      void draw(String nickname, String cardType, int card) throws RemoteException
      This method let the player draw from the decks or from the cards exposed
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the player who wants to draw
      cardType - is the type of the card that the player wants to draw (i.e. gold or resource)
      card - is an integer that allows the controller to know which card draw
      Throws:
      RemoteException - -

    • playACard

      void playACard(int card, int x, int y, boolean face, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method let the player play a card where he wants (and where is possible) on its field
      Parameters:
      card - is the card to play
      x - the x coordinates where to play the card
      y - the x coordinates where to play the card
      face - is how the card has to be played, face up or face down
      nickname - is the nickname of the player who wants to play the card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - -

    • pingIn

      void pingIn(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Method that adds to the server message queue the ping sent from the client
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player who has sent the ping
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • broadcastMessage

      void broadcastMessage(StringBuilder message, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Method that adds the chat message to the queue of chat messages
      Parameters:
      message - sent
      nickname - of the player who ha sent the chat message
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • privateMessage

      void privateMessage(StringBuilder message, String receiver, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Method that adds the chat message to the queue of chat messages
      Parameters:
      message - sent
      receiver - the player to send the message
      nickname - the player who has sent the message
      Throws:
      RemoteException

      Parameters:

      choose - indicates which one of the 2 objective the player has chosen

      RemoteException
